spatial_accuracy.notes: Door placement and orientation are incorrect for the bedroom, bathroom, and entrance. Window placement is significantly different in the living area and bedroom. Room proportions for the kitchen/living area and bathroom are distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the staircase from the floor plan. Wall thickness consistency varies. Door embedding correctness is poor due to incorrect placement.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement in the kitchen is largely accurate. Bedroom furniture is different from the plan. Living room furniture is partially accurate but also different. Scale consistency is acceptable for placed items.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness is good. Orthographic projection is accurate. Lighting quality is decent. Geometry is clean with no major distortions, but some small elements like plants are missing. Visual clarity is good.

detected_errors.description: Door to bedroom is repositioned and orientation is incorrect.
Door to bathroom is repositioned and orientation is incorrect.
Main entrance door is repositioned and orientation is incorrect.
Windows in the kitchen/living area are different in number and placement.
Window in the bedroom is changed in placement and size.
Staircase is completely missing from the render.
Proportions of the kitchen/living area appear stretched in one dimension.
Proportions of the bathroom appear more square than in the plan.
A table and two chairs are added in the kitchen/living area that are not present in the floor plan.
A desk and chair are added in the bedroom that are not present in the floor plan.
A TV stand and television are added in the living area that are not present in the floor plan.
Plants on the exterior are missing.
Wardrobe/closet in the bathroom/hallway area is missing.
